welcome_message_body: Welcome to Meram, Turkey! Get ready to immerse yourself in the rich history and natural beauty of this charming city known for its hot springs, cultural sites, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Meram has to offer.

restaurants.name: Bizim Bayram Usta Etliekmek

restaurants.address: Aydınlık Evler Cd. Meslek Sk. 33/A (Aydınlık Evler Cd), Konya
